bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of stiff back with difficulties to move. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry sang shang ji sheng 桑上寄生： 主腰痛，小兒背強，癰腫 , “It controls lower back pain, stiff back in children, and obstruction-illnesses with swelling”. Bei yang chuang 悲羊瘡 , sad sheep sores [1]

Pathological Condition identical with zou pi qu chuang 走皮趨瘡 , sores running through the skin. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zi wei 紫葳 quotes Ren zhai zhi zhi fang 仁齋直指方 : 走皮趨瘡：滿頰滿頂，浸淫濕爛，延 及兩耳，癢而出水，發歇不定。田野名悲羊瘡 , “Sores running through the skin: they cover cheeks and the entire top of the head with soaking moisture and a festering extending to the two ears. They itch and release liquid, with irregular periods of activity and dormancy. In the countryside this is named sad sheep sores ”.
